item.description:
Bring your art journal for a fun evening of chatting and journaling! We'll share tips and tricks for incorporating text and headlines together with found images from magazines, painting, rubberstamping, and more to create unique pages that can help you work through a difficult problem, plan your next project, or just make a record of what you did today.

 

Don't have an art journal yet? Almost anything can work as an art journal, but if you need guidance Strathmore offers an excellent Visual Journal now, available at Amazon.com or locally at A.C. Moore.

 

We have lots of supplies on hand, but please bring a journal to work in and - if you prefer - your favorite paints, some images, preferred adhesives, etc.

group.name: New England Artist Trading Cards Plus (ATCs+) Meetup Group

item.name: Art Journal Evening - with tips and tricks!
